indexing.paragraph: UZAIR ANWAR SHAIKH
Mumbai, Maharashtra +91 76669 44215 | uzazirshaikhking777@gmail.com
OBJECTIVE

Dedicated and enthusiastic Computer Science and Engineering student specializing in Blockchain, IoT, and Cybersecurity, eager to apply technical expertise and analytical skills to real-world challenges. Seeking opportunities to gain hands-on experience, enhance knowledge, and contribute to organizational growth.
EDUCATION
Bachelor of Engineering in Computer Science and Engineering Major: Blockchain, IoT & Cybersecurity 2024 – 2027 (Pursuing)
Diploma in Computer Engineering Vidyalankar Polytechnic, Mumbai 2021 – 2024 (Pursuing)
SSC (10th Standard) Saeeda M.S. Naik High School, Ratnagiri Passed July 2020 | 85% – First Division
TECHNICAL SKILLS
Programming Languages: Python, SQL, Shell (Bash & PowerShell)
Operating Systems: Linux (Ubuntu/Fedora) - Advanced proficiency, Windows - Intermediate
Server Management: Deployment and maintenance of Linux and Windows server environments
Hardware: Hardware installation, configuration, and maintenance
Software Management: Software installation, configuration, and deployment across multiple platforms
Web Technologies: HTML, CSS, Backend Scripting (Basic)
Cybersecurity: Threat analysis, Network security principles
CERTIFICATIONS
SQL Programming Certification
Cybersecurity Beginner Certification
AREAS OF INTEREST

System Security and Fault Analysis
IoT Systems and Blockchain Applications
COMPUTER PROFICIENCY
Experienced in configuring and maintaining multi-platform server environments
Proficient in hardware installation, troubleshooting, and maintenance
Skilled in software installation, configuration, and deployment across Linux and Windows platforms
Strong expertise in Linux system administration with advanced command-line proficiency
Comfortable working in various IDEs and production environments (VS Code, PyCharm, terminal editors)
PERSONAL ATTRIBUTES
Quick learner and detail-oriented
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
Adaptable, curious, and collaborative team player
